content: ragdoll bunny inspired by tina barriga pattern by peihan orestes notes i used a f hook 3 75mm and worsted weight yarn but use whatever combination produces a pretty tight fabric the only part that is stuffed is the head- all others are worked in the round and flattened i used 8mm safety eyes but they can also be embroidered on head start with a magic_ring or chain 2 using gray yarn round 1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring or first chain 6 round 2 increase in each st 12 round 3 increase single_crochet around 18 round 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 rounds 5-7 single_crochet in each st 24 switch to white yarn rounds 8-10 single_crochet in each st 24 if using safety eyes add them between row 6 and 7 approx 5 sts apart embroider the nose with pink yarn start stuffing firmly round 11 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 round 12 decrease single_crochet around 12 round 13 decrease around 6 finish off ears make 2 start with a magic_ring or chain 2 round 1 4 single_crochet into magic_ring or first chain 4 round 2 increase single_crochet around 6 round 3 increase single_crochet 2 around 8 round 4 increase single_crochet 3 around 10 round 5 increase single_crochet 4 around 12 rounds 6-9 single_crochet in each st 12 round 10 decrease single_crochet 4 around 10 round 11 decrease single_crochet 3 around 8 finish off with long tail for sewing flatten ears don t stuff and sew to head at whatever angle looks cutest to you body/dress start with long tail chain 2 does not count as a stitch round 1 chain 12 starting in second chain from hook single_crochet 11 slip_stitch in first st to form a circle 11 round 2 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet 3 around including slip_stitch from last round slip_stitch to first double_crochet 15 round 3 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 4 double_crochet increase double_crochet 4 around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 18 round 4 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 5 double_crochet increase double_crochet 5 around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 21 round 5 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 6 double_crochet increase double_crochet 6 around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 24 round 6 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 7 double_crochet increase double_crochet 7 around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 27 round 7 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet 8 double_crochet increase double_crochet 8 around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 30 round 8 chain 2 double_crochet increase in same st double_crochet double_crochet increase double_crochet around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 45 finish off flatten and use long tail to sew to head arms/legs make 4 start with a magic_ring or chain 2 using white yarn round 1 4 single_crochet into magic_ring or first chain 4 round 2 increase in each st 8 round 3 single_crochet in each st 8 switch to gray yarn rounds 4-10 single_crochet in each st 8 finish off
